name: Rabbit Mayhem
description:
Rabbit Mayhem is a game about you running around and avoiding the wrath of the rabbits. There are three different kinds, that will come at you at different points in this short game.

Red Rabbit - It has a consistent speed, and an average sprint.

Blue Rabbit - This one has a consistent speed, but a slow sprint (He's very sleepy).

Shadow Rabbit - Everything is random with this one. All bets are off.

All code and designs are by Me (Hype_ERR)

Fear of Impending Demise and Donnington - Deplexer (Hype_ERR Studios Song Designer)
